name: poison-heal
caption: Poison Heal

effect.short: Heals for 1/8 max [HP]{mechanic:hp} after each turn when [poisoned]{mechanic:poison} in place of damage.
effect.full: If this Pokémon is [poisoned]{mechanic:poison}, it will heal for 1/8 of its maximum [HP]{mechanic:hp} after each turn rather than taking damage.  This includes bad poison.

flavorText:
Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned, instead of
losing HP.
